Description:
Detects suspicious child process creations of VMware Tools process which may indicate persistence setup

Author: bohops, Bhabesh Raj
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: VMToolsd Suspicious Child Process
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((parent_process_path like '%\vmtoolsd.exe' and ((process_path like '%\cmd.exe' or process_path like '%\cscript.exe' or process_path like '%\mshta.exe' or process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe' or process_path like '%\regsvr32.exe' or process_path like '%\rundll32.exe' or process_path like '%\wscript.exe') and (original_file_name = 'cmd.exe' or original_file_name = 'cscript.exe' or original_file_name = 'mshta.exe' or original_file_name = 'powershell.exe' or original_file_name = 'pwsh.dll' or original_file_name = 'regsvr32.exe' or original_file_name = 'rundll32.exe' or original_file_name = 'wscript.exe'))) and  not ((process_path like '%\cmd.exe' and (command like '%\vmware\vmware tools\poweron-vm-default.bat%' or command like '%\vmware\vmware tools\poweroff-vm-default.bat%' or command like '%\vmware\vmware tools\resume-vm-default.bat%' or command like '%\vmware\vmware tools\suspend-vm-default.bat%')) or (process_path like '%\cmd.exe' and command = '') or (process_path like '%\cmd.exe' and command = 'null')))
